title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 203.9 - Stopping, standing or parking
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 203.9 - Stopping, standing or parking

State Regulations

No vehicle shall stop, stand or park on any part of the
authority facilities, except: (a) on
those areas provided for that purpose at toll plaza areas and maintenance
areas; (b) while paying a
toll; (c) in emergencies; or
(d) when under the direction of
an authority agent or employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

203.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
